thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.com.au
thread.title: Rachel B

author: Rachel B
title: Rachel B
text: I designed my own wedding invitation suite and was looking everywhere to find somewhere to print them! At first I decided to go to Vistaprint, but I was not happy at all with their choice of paper available, as I need my guests to be able to write on their RSVP cards to send back to me, so I then found Optimalprint, and at first I was concerned about their prices, but then found out they are always running great deals on products, and I managed to get a 50% coupon! I received my order today, and the quality of my invitations are amazing and the paper is the best ever! I can safely say I am a very happy Bride-to-be, and it is one less stress on my mind! Thank you Optimalprint!
